channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dow futures jump, bond yields fall on Bessent pick for Treasury secretary
Alex Jones is heading back to court to try to stop The Onion’s purchase of Infowars, calling sale fraud and collusion
item.description: At stake is whether Jones gets to stay at Infowars’ studio in Austin, Texas, under a new owner friendly to him, or whether he gets kicked out by The O...

item.title: Remote work jobs are disappearing—but they’re becoming a talent gold mine for employers still offering them
item.description: The share of remote positions on LinkedIn have plummeted in the last year, but applications for remote jobs are staying strong.

item.title: Bosch, one of Germany’s biggest employers, cuts working hours for 10,000 extra staff following expanded layoffs
item.description: Robert Bosch, which employes arounf 429,000 people, is overhauling its workforce as the company struggles with Germany's flatlining economy.

item.title: Bitcoin’s rally is making some investors nervous about the stock market
Bitcoin’s rally is making some investors nervous about the stock market
Will inflation stick around? What oil, gold and stocks are saying about prices
UniCredit launches $10.6 billion bid for Banco BPM
‘Busiest Thanksgiving ever’ as 80 million expected to travel for the holiday and record numbers set to flood U.S. airports
item.description: Airline passengers might get lucky like they did last year, when relatively few flights were canceled during the holiday week.

item.title: Chinese hackers are mobilizing, U.S. official says
item.description: They could manipulate HVAC systems in server rooms or disrupt power and water to data centers.
